message.subject: Furniture
message.content:
M1.1. Pam,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. I don't see why the clearing of 41 is a prerequisite.
[Inform: Dan doesn't know why 41 must be cleared]
M1.3. Let's just get it moved from 4th to where ever so people can see it.
[Inform: they should move 41 (or its contents, if it is a room) to somewhere more visible]
M1.4. I've got a whole floor of people apprehensive about the move and wasting time talking about what the working enviornment might be like when we finally move back.
[Inform: Dan knows many people who are unhappy about the move]
M1.5. We've got enough to worry about, this isn't worth the noise.
[Inform: Dan thinks this isn't worth all the noise that will ensue]
M1.6. If people just see it, they will understand that this is not going to be a minimum footprint sardine pack, and any noise will stop.
[Inform: if people see this, noise will end]
M1.7. When can we expect it to be available for viewing.
[Request-Information: when can 41 be available for viewing]
Flink1.7
M1.8. Do you want me to have Julie arrange it with Claudia?
[Request-Information: should Julie arrange this with Claudia]
Flink1.8
M1.9. Also, What has happened to our move?
[Request-Information: what happened to the move]
Flink1.9
M1.10. We were supposed to move yesterday, we're all packed up in boxes, and nobody seems to know what happened or when we are moving now.
[Inform: moving was supposed to occur yesterday, and nobody knows what happened]
M1.11. Dan
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Furniture
message.content:
M2.1. What about our move????
[Request-Information: what about move]
Flink2.1
